subject: Economy
question_en: What is the concept of National Income?
question_hi: राष्ट्रीय आर्तित आर्थिक आय का क्या समझने का मतलब है?
explanation_en: National Income (NI) refers to the total value of all goods and services produced within a country's geographical boundaries in a specific time period, typically a year. It is the sum of Gross Domestic Product (GDP), Net National Product (NNP), and Net National Income (NNI). In simple terms, it represents the total income earned by the citizens of a country from the activities within it.
explanation_hi: राष्ट्रीय आर्थिक आय (NI) refers to the total value of all goods and services produced within a country's geographical boundaries in a specific time period, usually a year. It is the sum of Gross Domestic Product (GDP), Net National Product (NNP), and Net National Income (NNI). In simple terms, it represents the total income earned by the citizens of a country from the activities within it.
